name: Poly travels
overview:
We, from the historic Suncity of Jodhpur, Rajasthan(India) feel immense pleasure to greet you in the wake of the widening horizons of the Tourism industry with our well established Tour & Travel company “Poly Travels”, highly recommended in widely circulated international travel Guide Book. Explore the vibrant and exotic state of India, Rajasthan, where tradition and royal splendor unite in a riot of colors against the vast backdrop of sand and desert. Rajasthan - the land endowed with invincible forts, magnificent palace havelies, rich culture and heritage, beauty and natural resources. A land rich in music, dance, art and craft “Poly Travels -Jodhpur” provides an excellent opportunity to make many new friends, learn about unknown places, culture & gain new experience. Your time, energy & enthusiasm can make a difference in the lives of the communities we visit.

Come and meet India’s people and let them show you their homeland. We believe the time has come to step off the well-worn tourist trails and head into the heart of India, allowing you the chance to witness firsthand the life that the vast majority of Indians live.
